mapper.sql: INOUTINST_ID inoutinstId, ITEMINST_ID iteminstId, ITEM_INOUT_ID itemInoutId, MATINST_ID matinstId, CERTINST_ID certinstId, CREATER creater, CREATE_TIME createTime, MODIFIER modifier, MODIFY_TIME modifyTime, IS_COLLECTED isCollected, IS_PAR_IN isParIn, PAR_IN_ID parInId, ROOT_ORG_ID rootOrgId

${alias}.INOUTINST_ID inoutinstId, ${alias}.ITEMINST_ID iteminstId, ${alias}.ITEM_INOUT_ID itemInoutId, ${alias}.MATINST_ID matinstId, ${alias}.CERTINST_ID certinstId, ${alias}.CREATER creater, ${alias}.CREATE_TIME createTime, ${alias}.MODIFIER modifier, ${alias}.MODIFY_TIME modifyTime, ${alias}.IS_COLLECTED isCollected, ${alias}.IS_PAR_IN isParIn, ${alias}.PAR_IN_ID parInId
mapper.insert: insert into AEA_HI_ITEM_INOUTINST (INOUTINST_ID, ITEMINST_ID, ITEM_INOUT_ID, MATINST_ID, CERTINST_ID, CREATER, CREATE_TIME, MODIFIER, MODIFY_TIME, IS_COLLECTED, IS_PAR_IN, PAR_IN_ID,ROOT_ORG_ID) values (#{inoutinstId}, #{iteminstId}, #{itemInoutId}, #{matinstId}, #{certinstId}, #{creater}, #{createTime}, #{modifier}, #{modifyTime}, #{isCollected}, #{isParIn}, #{parInId},#{rootOrgId})
mapper.update:
update AEA_HI_ITEM_INOUTINST
INOUTINST_ID = #{inoutinstId},
ITEMINST_ID = #{iteminstId},
ITEM_INOUT_ID = #{itemInoutId},
MATINST_ID = #{matinstId},
CERTINST_ID = #{certinstId},
CREATER = #{creater},
CREATE_TIME = #{createTime},
MODIFIER = #{modifier},
MODIFY_TIME = #{modifyTime},
IS_COLLECTED = #{isCollected},
IS_PAR_IN = #{isParIn},
PAR_IN_ID = #{parInId},
ROOT_ORG_ID = #{rootOrgId},
where INOUTINST_ID = #{inoutinstId}

if.foreach:
update AEA_HI_ITEM_INOUTINST
INOUTINST_ID = #{item.inoutinstId},
ITEMINST_ID = #{item.iteminstId},
ITEM_INOUT_ID = #{item.itemInoutId},
MATINST_ID = #{item.matinstId},
CERTINST_ID = #{item.certinstId},
CREATER = #{item.creater},
CREATE_TIME = #{item.createTime},
MODIFIER = #{item.modifier},
MODIFY_TIME = #{item.modifyTime},
IS_COLLECTED = #{item.isCollected},
IS_PAR_IN = #{item.isParIn},
PAR_IN_ID = #{item.parInId},
ROOT_ORG_ID = #{item.rootOrgId}
where INOUTINST_ID = #{item.inoutinstId}

update AEA_HI_ITEM_INOUTINST
INOUTINST_ID = #{item.inoutinstId},
ITEMINST_ID = #{item.iteminstId},
ITEM_INOUT_ID = #{item.itemInoutId},
MATINST_ID = #{item.matinstId},

where INOUTINST_ID = #{item.inoutinstId}

mapper.delete: delete from AEA_HI_ITEM_INOUTINST where CERTINST_ID in #{certinstId}
mapper.insert:
insert into AEA_HI_ITEM_INOUTINST ( INOUTINST_ID ,ITEMINST_ID ,ITEM_INOUT_ID ,MATINST_ID ,CERTINST_ID ,CREATER ,CREATE_TIME ,MODIFIER ,MODIFY_TIME ,IS_COLLECTED ,IS_PAR_IN ,PAR_IN_ID,ROOT_ORG_ID )
select #{item.inoutinstId},#{item.iteminstId},#{item.itemInoutId},#{item.matinstId},#{item.certinstId},#{item.creater},#{item.createTime},#{item.modifier},#{item.modifyTime},#{item.isCollected},#{item.isParIn},#{item.parInId},#{item.rootOrgId} from dual
mapper.select:
select
from aea_hi_item_inoutinst ahii, ( select aii.inout_id from aea_hi_iteminst hii ,aea_item_inout aii where hii.ITEMINST_ID = #{iteminstId} and aii.item_ver_id= hii.ITEM_VER_ID and aii.is_input='0' and aii.file_type='cert' and aii.IS_DELETED='0' )ggg where ahii.ITEMINST_ID = #{iteminstId} and ggg.inout_id = ahii.item_inout_id

select
from aea_hi_item_inoutinst ahii where ahii.CERTINST_ID=#{certinstId}
